Dm_ZO_0006_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionAngry_01>How did you find this place?!<sp:5:1:0> What cruel
ploy are you plotting?
Dm_ZO_0006_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:SickThink_00>According to your story, Princess Zelda
disappeared suddenly in the depths
beneath Hyrule Castle.
On the other hand, she suddenly
appeared near Zora's Domain and
unleashed a monster upon us.
The waters of truth have become murkier
still,<sp:5:1:0> but from the Zora perspective,
one thing is clear.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>It all leads back to the sky.


<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>This disaster,<sp:5:1:0> the sludge, the monster,
and even Princess Zelda.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>It may well be that the answer to these
riddles can only be found skyward...
Dm_ZO_0006_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_01>Sidon ordered <clr:0000>Jiahto<clr:ffff>, a historian well
acquainted with ruins, to investigate.

I wonder if any progress has been made...
Dm_ZO_0006_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Gah! Who approaches?!<sp:5:1:0>


Is that you?<sp:5:0:0> So it is... Link!
Dm_ZO_0006_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Happy_00>Ah! <sp:5:1:0>So you have already spoken
with Jiahto!
Dm_ZO_0006_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>You say that the <clr:0000>mark of the king<clr:ffff> was
mentioned on the stone slate that was
restored? Hm... Indeed, I do know of it.
The <clr:0000>mark of the king<clr:ffff> refers to a Zora
king's scale. One of my scales,
in other words.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I have heard it called by the name you
mentioned in an ancient ritual. However,
none remain who know how it was used...
<sp:3:0:2:0001>If this particular scale of mine may prove
useful to you, by all means, take a few.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>There is no need for restraint! This is as
nothing to me. <sp:5:1:0>If you run out, simply
return and acquire more.
<snd:LaughL_01>Wah ha ha!
Dm_ZO_0006_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SickThink_01>Well, well... To think that such a thing
should transpire for the hero of Hyrule
and Princess Zelda...
Dm_ZO_0006_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Tell me, Link.<sp:5:1:0> Has any progress
been made?
Dm_ZO_0006_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:SickGreeting_00>Hold, my ever-loyal Muzu.


If you speak in such a way without
explanation, Link here will only be
confused as to what is going on.
Dm_ZO_0006_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:SickThink_01>After all that has transpired, and after
much reflection, I have come to a
realization.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I must truly be getting on in years to have
allowed a mere monster to catch me
off guard.
Perhaps the time is nearing for me to pass
the title of king on to Sidon.
Dm_ZO_0006_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:SickThink_00>Hello, Link. It has been some time since
we last spoke.

I had received word that you went missing
along with Princess Zelda. Why have you
come here?
Dm_ZO_0006_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionAngry_00>You expect us to believe that Princess
Zelda simply disappeared, just like that.<sp:5:1:0>
Do not sully our ears with your lies!
<sp:3:0:2:0901>I saw Princess Zelda with my own eyes
right after the phenomenon at Hyrule
Castle took place!
Dm_ZO_0006_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>In any case, that is a matter for another
day, after the chaos surrounding the
sludge has quieted.
Please inform Sidon about my situation
and about the king's scale.

<sp:3:0:2:0601><snd:TalkPositive_00>Tell him there is no need to worry about
me. Tell him that he must go forth and
do what needs to be done.
Dm_ZO_0006_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Gah! Who approaches?!<sp:5:1:0>


Is that you?<sp:5:0:0> So it is... Link!


<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionAngry_01>How did you find this place?!


King Dorephan is resting.


<snd:Shitauchi_00>He has nothing to say to you! I insist that
you leave this very instant!
Dm_ZO_0006_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Calm yourself, Muzu.


Link's eyes betray no hint of deception.
He remains a trusted friend of the Zora.

There must be an explanation.
Dm_ZO_0006_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>We encountered Princess Zelda just after
Hyrule Castle ascended into the sky.

Floating islands appeared as if from
nowhere...<sp:5:1:0>sludge and fragments of
ruins began raining down...
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Muzu and I had left the domain to
investigate these strange occurrences.
That is when it happened.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:SickGreeting_00>Princess Zelda descended from the sky
accompanied by a sludge monster.

What happened next took us by surprise...<sp:5:1:0>
She then unleashed the beast upon us.
Dm_ZO_0006_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionAngry_01>Gah! You have returned, have you?
What cruel ploy are you plotting?!
Dm_ZO_0006_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Link. I will now tell you what happened
when we last saw Princess Zelda...

As well as the reason behind my seclusion
here in the Pristine Sanctum.<sp:5:1:0>
Dm_ZO_0006_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>King Dorephan is resting.


Regardless, you cannot be trusted! I insist
that you leave this very instant!
Dm_ZO_0006_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>King Dorephan valiantly vanquished the
threat. However... <sp:5:1:0>He was gravely injured
by the sludge during the battle...
As for Princess Zelda, she vanished
without a trace.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble_00>If word got out that Princess Zelda lost
her mind and harmed the Zora king...<sp:5:1:0> The
resulting turmoil would be devastating.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>That is why we are temporarily remaining
hidden within the Pristine Sanctum.
